attributes.action: cancel current and all future plans to show and produce big brother and anything linked to this programe
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Big Brother is a simple waste of time, effort and money.
The producers should be fined, and that fine should go towards improving the British movies, charities or programes to help troubled youths and adults, improve the educational system, improve community activities, the options are endless on what we can do with there fine.
The time slot which Big Brother holds can be and should be used for far more entertaining or educational programming, those who watch the programe should be ashamed of themselves as well as the channel four production team and the director of channel 4

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
